com.here.android.mpa.routing

Class UMRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route
      • com.here.android.mpa.routing.UMRoute

  • public final class UMRoute
extends Route
    Route extension with Urban Mobility specifics like ticketing information or real-time data. Represents a single route/connection within UMRouteResult.

    IMPORTANT: Urban Mobility routing is a Beta feature. The related classes are subject to change without notice.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route

        Route.EtaValidity, Route.TrafficPenaltyMode

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route

        WHOLE_ROUTE
